SummaryEnglish: Yo-kai Watch♪ (2021) follows the adventures of Nathan Adams, Jibanyan and Whisper, continuing the episodic segment format that was previously established in the original anime series and the Yo-kai Watch! series. Yo-kai Watch♪ (2021) takes place after the Yo-kai Watch! series where all of Nate's Yo-kai Watch models he has collected have gone into repairs, so he gets an enhanced original Yo-kai Watch model from Whisper as a replacement, that recognizes all types of Yo-kai Medals.
SummaryJapanese:
It follows the adventures of Nathan Adams, Jibanyan and Whisper, continuing the episodic segment format that was previously established in the original anime series and the Yo-kai Watch! series.
It takes place after the Yo-kai Watch! series where all of Nate's Yo-kai Watch models he has collected have gone into repairs, so he gets an enhanced original Yo-kai Watch model from Whisper as a replacement, that recognizes all types of Yo-kai Medals.

1.SummaryEnglish: Yo-kai Exist Looking back on the memorable first encounter between Nathan Adams, a very ordinary fifth grader, and Whisper, a Yo-kai butler. There is no Yo-kai Watch on Nate's arm! Whisper had sent all the Yo-kai Watch models of all time for repair. When he opened the box containing the watch that had been repaired and returned, he found that it was... Wash Your Hands Bear and Katie came to the place where Nate was washing his hands in the restroom. Nate wondered if bear would wash his hands as well. He left without washing at all! When Nate, who thought it was strange, illuminated the area with a Yo-kai Watch, there was a Yo-kai Pandle who made the possessed person careless. Furthermore, other classmates are possessed with all kinds of Yo-kai, and the restroom is confused. In such a case, summon a Yo-kai from the far future, "Robonyan F", and solve it.
1.TitleJapanese: Yo-kai Exist? 4-Komasan: The First in a Long Time! Announcement! Yo-kai Caricature Press Conference Yo-kai Switch! Wash Your Hands Yo-kai Theater: Momotaro
1.SummaryJapanese:
Yo-kai Exist
Looking back on the memorable first encounter between Nathan Adams, a very ordinary fifth grader, and Whisper, a Yo-kai butler. There is no Yo-kai Watch on Nate's arm! Whisper had sent all the Yo-kai Watch models of all time for repair. When he opened the box containing the watch that had been repaired and returned, he found that it was...

Wash Your Hands
Bear and Katie came to the place where Nate was washing his hands in the restroom. Nate wondered if bear would wash his hands as well. He left without washing at all! When Nate, who thought it was strange, illuminated the area with a Yo-kai Watch, there was a Yo-kai Pandle who made the possessed person careless. Furthermore, other classmates are possessed with all kinds of Yo-kai, and the restroom is confused. In such a case, summon a Yo-kai from the far future, "Robonyan F", and solve it.

2.SummaryEnglish: Nightmare Remote Party Nate makes a toast with juice, so that him and his friends can have a remote drinking party that is popular among adults. But suddenly, mom came into the room and began to reveal the embarrassing secrets of Nate to everyone. The cause was that the Yo-kai "Tattletell" was attached to his mom. Tattletell who escaped was caught by sandwiching it with a laptop computer, but because of that, Tattletell who entered the world of the internet is exposed to the possessed person in every remote space. Aim for the Popular Yo-kai! Manjimutt, Poofessor, and Whisper gathered in a certain place and Toiletta was also there. It is said that Toiletta, a super producer, will produce them as popular Yo-kai, who have become the worst three Yo-kai you don't want to see anymore. For starters, she'll try to have them imitate the popular Yo-kai Jibanyan and Komasan.
2.TitleJapanese: Nightmare Remote Party/ Aim for the Popular Yo-kai!/ Quiz! Watch What Yo-kai are Doing!/ 4-Komasan: Magic Trick/ Announcement! Yo-kai Caricature Press Conference/ Yo-kai Switch!/ Yo-kai Theater: Urash
2.SummaryJapanese:
Nightmare Remote Party
Nate makes a toast with juice, so that him and his friends can have a remote drinking party that is popular among adults. But suddenly, mom came into the room and began to reveal the embarrassing secrets of Nate to everyone. The cause was that the Yo-kai "Tattletell" was attached to his mom. Tattletell who escaped was caught by sandwiching it with a laptop computer, but because of that, Tattletell who entered the world of the internet is exposed to the possessed person in every remote space.

Aim for the Popular Yo-kai!
Manjimutt, Poofessor, and Whisper gathered in a certain place and Toiletta was also there. It is said that Toiletta, a super producer, will produce them as popular Yo-kai, who have become the worst three Yo-kai you don't want to see anymore. For starters, she'll try to have them imitate the popular Yo-kai Jibanyan and Komasan.

3.SummaryEnglish: Cashless! Supoor Hero! When Nate's mom asks him to shop, he encounters a Yo-kai called "Supoor Hero" who makes the possessed person poor in any way. It seems that he was aiming to take the wallet from Nate and make him poor, but what Nate had was not a wallet but a smartphone. Now is the age of cashless payments, no cash. Supoor Hero, who learns about it, appears in an outrageous action. The Hidden Power of Whisper Knowing that there is a legendary fortune teller who sees all the hidden abilities of Yo-kai with the power of a dragon, Whisper thinks that if he finds a new ability, he should become a popular Yo-kai, so he visits the fortune teller. However, it was the Yo-kai "Draggie" who was there. He has you to occupy it immediately, but there is nothing reflected in Draggie's crystal ball.
3.TitleJapanese: Cashless! Supoor Hero!/ The Hidden Power of Whisper/ Quiz! Watch What Yo-kai are Doing!/ 4-Komasan: Calendar/ Announcement! Yo-kai Caricature Press Conference/ Yo-kai Switch!/ Going Hunting: Walkappa
3.SummaryJapanese:
Cashless! Supoor Hero!
When Nate's mom asks him to shop, he encounters a Yo-kai called "Supoor Hero" who makes the possessed person poor in any way. It seems that he was aiming to take the wallet from Nate and make him poor, but what Nate had was not a wallet but a smartphone. Now is the age of cashless payments, no cash. Supoor Hero, who learns about it, appears in an outrageous action.

The Hidden Power of Whisper
Knowing that there is a legendary fortune teller who sees all the hidden abilities of Yo-kai with the power of a dragon, Whisper thinks that if he finds a new ability, he should become a popular Yo-kai, so he visits the fortune teller. However, it was the Yo-kai "Draggie" who was there. He has you to occupy it immediately, but there is nothing reflected in Draggie's crystal ball.
